I am a third-year Information Security student, passionate about building secure network applications and solving cybersecurity challenges. My near goal is to be an intern in the SOC Tier 1 position, further I hope I can graduate on time and get a job in the Blue team.

I still have a lot to learn and practice, especially in cybersecurity. Currently I am researching about topics such as IPS/IDS, SOC Analyst and Threat Intelligence. I would be happy if you could share with me your knowledge on this topic.

Programming: C++, Python, Assembly Intel x86 Tools: Nmap, Wireshark, GDB, pwntools, Nessus, Suricata, OSSEC English: TOEIC LR 690, TOEIC SW 280. Able to read and understand documents, scientific articles, write emails and essays as well as communicate at a basic level.

Project Description Teammates Role GitHub Network Scanner Built a multi-functional scanner for network analysis. Huu Binh, Phuong Dai, Cong Danh Contributor View Code Obfuscator and Clone Code Detector Read, research, and reproduce the article. Huu Binh, Phuong Dai, Cong Danh Leader - Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) Learned how to manage users and data in domains, tested configuration on VMware. Huu Binh, Cong Danh, Huynh Do Thien An Contributor - Personal Blog Website Created a simple blog website using Docusaurus. - Creator -
I wonder what I should write here?
Email: 22520028@gm.uit.com Phone: 082 627 4939 GitHub: ThienAnUIT2022 Facebook: anotherLittleW

What do you think of the little whale above („Éª„Éª )? Yeah, that‚Äôs a whale who studies and works, is quite serious and often worries about the future (¬¥ÔΩ•·¥óÔΩ• ``). Be careful, I‚Äôm going to talk a lot ! (‚òÜœâ‚òÜ) As for me ( ÀôÍí≥‚ÄãÀô ), I‚Äôm a whale who swims in the clouds full of dreams, I pursue my passion and interests to nourish my soul („Å£ ÀòœâÀòœÇ ). I like quiet and peaceful places (¬¥Íí≥`)‚ô°, away from crowded and noisy places (Ôø£ Ôø£|||). I like to spend my days off at home cooking, making coffee, reading manga and listening to soft music (¬¥,,‚Ä¢œâ‚Ä¢,,)‚ô°.

I extremely love taking pictures (‚âßœâ‚â¶)! I take pictures not only to capture moments but also to show people how I see the world. My style is photos that have an "artistic" perspective or at least something special that I think is beautiful. Also, the colors in my photos are mostly warm and washed out, like 90s film. You can see my albums below (>·¥ó‚Ä¢): Express my style Sunset, sunrise and sky Little things

Hmmm, I read and watch a lot of Japanese anime, manga and light novels, my friend and someone call me "wibu" or "otaku" [(=^ÔΩ•œâÔΩ•^=)]. The games I play are usually games with similar art style to anime and manga including Honkai Impact 3rd (played the most), Honkai Star Rail, Girl's Frontline 1 & 2.

I listen to many different genres of music and usually according to the time of day or my mood. For example, according to the time, in the morning I will listen to dynamic Jazz like in coffee shops, in the afternoon I often listen to gentle Piano and in the evening it will be melodious, soulful Saxophone and Violin [(„Å£ ÀòœâÀòœÇ )]. Some singers that I like and listen to regularly are: Vietnamese: H√† Anh Tu·∫•n ƒêen V√¢u V≈©. Ph·∫°m H·ªìng Ph∆∞·ªõc Phan M·∫°nh Qu·ª≥nh T√°o N.H.A Taynguyensound buitruonglinh Qu·∫•t ƒêi·ªÅn Japanese: Aimer Uru LiSa Lilas Ikuta milet MYTH&ROID FLOW back number HOYO-MiX Vanguard Sound Ayasa And some songs: Ride on time, Plastic Love US-UK: Keane Imagine Dragons Sia Tom Odell Charlie Puth Stephen Sanchez Backstreet Boys The Beatles Modern Talking Chinese: I only listen to a playlist, or individual songs, not artists („Éª‚Äì„Éª;)„Çû.

I can say that I drink coffee instead of water every day :b, because every morning when I wake up and in the evening I will drink a cup of coffee (2 cups/day), sometimes when I lack sleep I will drink more. I will not have a day of alertness without a drop of coffee that day ( ‚ïπ‚ñΩ‚ïπ ). I'm not very good at cooking, but I enjoy the process of preparing, cooking and enjoying the food I make. I also often cook for my friends and am happy when they say it's delicious (¬¥Íí≥`)‚ô°. When I was young, I had a lot of free time and my mother had an Origami book so I folded them a lot (Ôø£ ‚ñΩ Ôø£)„Çû, gradually it became a hobby, whenever I had free time I would make them. I quite like regular polyhedra so I also found ways to make them for decoration, to make flower pots, to make desk calendars...etc. Besides, I like giving gifts to friends so I often make small gifts for them, sometimes I also wrap flowers myself. Well, Did you really read this far Œ£( ¬∞ ‚ñ≥ ¬∞|||) ? A-A-Are you interested in me (‚ÅÑ ‚ÅÑ‚Ä¢‚ÅÑœâ‚ÅÑ‚Ä¢‚ÅÑ ‚ÅÑ) Just kidding, ehehe :b. Anyway, thank you for taking the time to read this, have a nice day~.
